section.title: Examples

para.command: rg set -c "My first key" user/example/key "Some nice value"
rg set user:luciana/example/key -- "Some - nice - value with dashes"
rg set -u nobody -g http user:httpd/sw/httpd/key "Some value"

section.para: bash# rg ln system/sw/XFree/handmade system/sw/XFree/current # same as last command
